title: Cape Krusenstern National Monument: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      Â    Currently, there are no fees charged to access Cape Krusenstern National Monument.  If you are organizing a trip for yourself, the National Park Service does not require reservations for any type of travel or backcountry camping within the park. If you are part of an organized recreation group, contact the chief ranger for permit requirements and stipulations. Call us at 907.442.3890. Licensed guides and transporters should be contacted in advance to plan travel logistics.
